results.content: This was a good quick refresher course for me, BUT it was also a great way to get exposure to some critical points of writing a plugin. You have to see this class to believe it.

response.content: Thank you very much for the feedback Jamie, glad you found it useful  :)
response.content_html: Thank you very much for the feedback Jamie, glad you found it useful :)
